document.masterDocTitle: A survey of the weevils of Ukraine (Coleoptera: Curculionoidea)

bibRefCitation.author: Gyllenhal, L.

subSubSection.paragraph: Records. CRI DON KYI LUG LWI MYK* ZAP ZAK [Volovnik 1995a: 316; Mazur 2002: 230 ; Nazarenko et al . 2003: 53].
Distribution. West Palaearctic (excluding north) ( Gültekin & Fremuth 2013 ).

Biology. Primary steppes. Beetles occure in VI–VII. Oligophagous on
Centaurea
( Asteraceae ):
C. orientalis ( Volovnik 1996a )
,
C. ornata (
Cobo et al . 2014
)
.
Notes. Record in Ivano-Frankivsk Province ( Sirenko & Slobodian 2012 ) is based on misidentification.
